line: Oh! Hello there! My name is Mr. Drinker, and I have an issue I'd like some help with

name: Mr. Drinker
line: This area is full of leftover drinks of different flavours and tastes. But none of them have enough for a single quenchy drink. That's why I need all of them to mix together.

name: Mr. Drinker
line: This way, I'll have the perfect Jungle Juice to satisfy my need for flavour! This is where you come in. See, I don't have any means to get anywhere... But you on the other hand...

name: Mr. Drinker
line: You have those excellent jumping boots! If you crouch they will charge up, and when you jump you will go to extraordinary heights! These are the skills that would make collecting the jungle juice easy!

name: Mr. Drinker
line: Well, do you think you gather 30 of the drinks scattered around for me?
